title: Unable to load chat
body: Have tried to reload chat services several times and it's not letting me put a screenshot..[](https://docs.google.com/document/d/18I9wxC0rwtzp7gn-VY1Co8VAzfs_O3jJ5cBWhmp1vE8/edit)

replies.body:
This is caused by the ongoing issue with our chat service that we're looking into. Check our [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates.

Let me know if you have any questions.
